tool_description: Validates and standardizes song metadata including titles, writers, publishers, and catalog numbers for royalty processing.

catalog_number.description: Unique catalog identifier for the song

error_messages: Missing required song metadata: song_title, catalog_number, writers, and publishers are mandatory.
Invalid catalog number format: Catalog number must follow standard format (letters and numbers only).
Duplicate writer names: Each writer should be listed only once in the writers array.
Empty writer or publisher arrays: At least one writer and one publisher must be specified.
usage: Provide song_title, catalog_number, writers array, and publishers array. Optionally include alternate_titles. Returns validated and standardized metadata.

validation_status.description: Status indicating if validation passed or failed

standardized_title.description: Standardized version of the song title
